subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Though the Nets lost Vince Carter to a sprained ankle in the second half, the team took advantage of the 76ers’ fourth-quarter collapse to win 85-83 on Saturday night.
snippet: Though the Nets lost Vince Carter to a sprained ankle in the second half, the team took advantage of the 76ers’ fourth-quarter collapse to win 85-83 on Saturday night.
